title: To the Lighthouse - words attractive to Charles

content.prompt: For which of the following reasons are the words “dissertation . . . fellowship . . . readership . . . lectureship” (paragraph 3) attractive to Charles Tansley?

choices.label: He thinks the terms will be universally understood.
He associates the terms with advancement in his career.
They are terms that have a fresh, new sound to him.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
